prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young man, the son of the sun god, standing centered on a pure white background, in the style of a Rococo oil painting, ornate and delicate, with strong decorative elements. The character has an ordinary yet pleasant appearance: an oval face with soft, gentle features. His eyes are a warm, luminous amber, holding a kind and determined expression, framed by medium-length, straight hair the color of sun-bleached wheat, falling just past his shoulders with soft waves. His skin has a healthy, sun-kissed glow. He wears elegant, ornate attire fitting a divine heir: a white silk poet shirt with billowing sleeves and intricate lace cuffs, layered over fitted cream-colored breeches. A golden-yellow brocade waistcoat, embroidered with subtle, swirling sun motifs and gilded leaf patterns, is worn over the shirt. A light, flowing cloak of sheer, shimmering fabric in hues of gold and pale amber drapes from one shoulder, catching an unseen light. His posture is calm and centered, hands resting gently at his sides, emanating a quiet, hopeful aura that aligns with the beautiful, light-infused fantasy world. The overall image is唯美,优美细腻, with no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, and no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
